content.p: This is a beta release of the server and clients.

Unpack into a working directory and run ./configure and then make. The source package includes recent validated versions of the Apache Portable Runtime (APR) and the Berkeley Database (BDB) as used by OpenAMQ.

Unpack into a working directory and run configure and then make. The source package includes recent validated versions of the Apache Portable Runtime (APR) and the Berkeley Database (BDB) as used by OpenAMQ.
Requires Microsoft Visual C++ 6.0 or later.
Download and unzip the package into a target directory. The clients subdirectory contains OpenAMQ client tools. The servers subdirectory contains the OpenAMQ server binaries.
